title: Extreme amounts of lag (may be ISP related)
body: Ever since the game crashes and d/c's yesterday, me and a few of my friends (who use rogers) have been getting 200 ping or so and it makes it hard to play. I don't know what happened... can anybody help?

replies.body:
Hey Tomtom,

Unfortunately, at a glance, it is really hard to determine whether there is an issue with the ISP, or whether the issues are localized to a specific network.  While you and several of your friends may be experience the issue, it does not mean there is a smoking gun in regards to your ISP.

In an effort to determine the health of your network, and whether this is the root cause, make sure that you open a new ticket to Player Support, found here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

When writing in, make sure to provide the following information:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
